name: FNaF 1 3DS port
description:
Five Nights at Freddy's 1 can OFFICIALLY be played on the nintendo 3DS!!! i have worked on this for a long time and am very exited for the FINAL release. difference between .cci and .cia?

you can use the .cci for emulation (recommended EMU is Citra) on your pc, use the .cia for 3DS installation!

//-----------------------------------graphics----------------------------------//

keep in mind graphics are SHIT, keep in mind it is VERY hard to develop for a Nintendo 3DS, due to low amounts of ram and V-ram! saving as much recourses as possible when making a 3DS game is needed, rather bad textures on a playable speed than 7 fps on good looking textures.

New 3DS AVG fps: 48 - 60 with some small frame drops of 2 - 3.
